meanings.definition: The act of making something symmetrical.
meanings.sent1: The symmetrizations of the painting brought balance to the composition.
meanings.sent2: She studied the symmetrizations of the shapes in the design.
meanings.sent3: The symmetrizations of the cake layers made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: His symmetrizations of the garden transformed it into a peaceful sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The symmetrizations of the room's decor created a harmonious atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The process of creating symmetry in an object or system.
meanings.sent1: The symmetrizations of the building's architecture were impressive.
meanings.sent2: Through careful symmetrizations, the bridge was made structurally sound.
meanings.sent3: The symmetrizations of the dance routine made it visually captivating.
meanings.sent4: Her symmetrizations of the data set revealed interesting patterns.
meanings.sent5: The symmetrizations of the music score added depth to the composition.
